duties_responsibilities.duty: Leading by example and living the standards and behaviors consistent with the core values and culture of the company.
Achieving financial objectives through rent collection and managing delinquency.
Sales and marketing to include conducting informative and personalized tours of the property resulting in new leases.
Building brand loyalty by ensuring every resident interaction is positive.
Ensuring that the property’s interior and exterior are impeccable and the team appropriately represents the company with a professional appearance.
Coaching, mentoring, and inspiring team members.
Working weekends when prospective residents are out looking for a new home.
Stepping in and taking responsibility for leading when the Property Manager is not present.

education_certification.credential: College degree in property management, hospitality, or retail industries.
